subject: Re: php5 and mail problems?
body:
I have php version 5 running here on my server and haven't noticed any
problems with it yet.  I haven't tried any mail functionality from
within any php scripts yet though.

On Sun, Apr 29, 2007 at 07:45:08PM -0600, Littlefield, Tyler wrote:
> Hello list,
> I just upgraded to php5, by demand of linux.
> Anyawy, mail seems to have broken.
> Anyone had this problem?
> Thanks,
